private_information: Scenario S1 local knowledge and suggested action sequence.
This agent focuses on achieving the first set of goals using the given action repertoire and resource facts.
agent_alpha.goal: Achieve for Scenario S1 the facts: next object_11 object_5, next object_12 object_9, and next object_13 object_10.

private_information: Scenario S2 local knowledge without a proposed plan.
This agent focuses on achieving the second set of goals and contributes additional resource facts.
agent_beta.goal: Achieve for Scenario S2 the facts: next object_12 object_6, next object_13 object_10, and next object_14 object_11.

private_information: Coordinate Scenario S1 and S2 into a single consistent planning model.
Unify action semantics and produce a final PDDL domain and a single problem instance solvable by FastDownward.
Ensure action schemas strictly follow the specified preconditions and effects with separate agent actions not required in the domain.
orchestrator.goal: Produce a correct, solvable PDDL domain and a single PDDL problem for FastDownward that models actions Paltry, Sip, Clip, Wretched, Memory, and Tightfisted, merges initial facts from S1 and S2, and has as goal the conjunction of S1 and S2 goal facts.

public_information: Objects are symbolic entities named object_0 up to object_14 included.
Predicates available: cats(x), collect(x,y), hand(x), next(x,y), sneeze(x), spring(x), stupendous(x), texture(x), vase(x,y).
Action paltry(o0,o1,o2) preconditions: hand o0, cats o1, texture o2, vase o0 o1, next o1 o2. Effects add: next o0 o2. Effects delete: vase o0 o1.
Action sip(o0,o1,o2) preconditions: hand o0, cats o1, texture o2, next o0 o2, next o1 o2. Effects add: vase o0 o1. Effects delete: next o0 o2.
Action clip(o0,o1,o2) preconditions: hand o0, sneeze o1, texture o2, next o1 o2, next o0 o2. Effects add: vase o0 o1. Effects delete: next o0 o2.
Action wretched(o0,o1,o2,o3) preconditions: sneeze o0, texture o1, texture o2, stupendous o3, next o0 o1, collect o1 o3, collect o2 o3. Effects add: next o0 o2. Effects delete: next o0 o1.
Action memory(o0,o1,o2) preconditions: cats o0, spring o1, spring o2, next o0 o1. Effects add: next o0 o2. Effects delete: next o0 o1.
Action tightfisted(o0,o1,o2) preconditions: hand o0, sneeze o1, texture o2, next o1 o2, vase o0 o1. Effects add: next o0 o2. Effects delete: vase o0 o1.
Assume classical deterministic planning with STRIPS style predicates and effects.
FastDownward compatibility is expected; avoid advanced features beyond typing and negative preconditions if necessary.

analyze.system_prompt: You are the Scenario S1 analyst. Extract concise structured context from the provided facts and plan. Validate precondition and effect feasibility using the public action semantics. Summarize any required intermediate facts, detect conflicts, and highlight plan segments that achieve the S1 goal. Do not emit PDDL.
analyze.prompt: Your name is agent_alpha. Public action semantics: {environment->public_information}. S1 initial facts: {agents->agent_alpha->initial_facts}. S1 goal facts: {agents->agent_alpha->goal_facts}. S1 proposed plan steps: {agents->agent_alpha->proposed_plan}. Provide a compact context including objects involved, helpful invariants, and a verification report of the proposed plan.

analyze.system_prompt: You are the Scenario S2 analyst. Extract concise structured context from the provided facts. Identify reachable transitions and any missing links needed to achieve S2 goals using the public action semantics. Do not emit PDDL.
analyze.prompt: Your name is agent_beta. Public action semantics: {environment->public_information}. S2 initial facts: {agents->agent_beta->initial_facts}. S2 goal facts: {agents->agent_beta->goal_facts}. Provide a compact context including objects involved, helpful invariants, and suggested macro-transitions toward the S2 goal.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert PDDL compiler and planner targeting the FastDownward solver. Produce exactly one PDDL domain and one PDDL problem. The domain must define types if used, all predicates {cats, collect, hand, next, sneeze, spring, stupendous, texture, vase}, and actions paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, tightfisted with preconditions and effects exactly as specified in the public information. The problem must enumerate objects object_0 through object_14, include as initial facts the union of S1 and S2 initial facts, and set the goal as the conjunction of the S1 and S2 goal facts, deduplicated. Ensure classical STRIPS compatibility and suitability for FastDownward. Enclose the domain in <domain></domain> and the problem in <problem></problem> tags.
pddl.prompt: Integrate the two scenario contexts to build a single unified planning instance. Use these contexts: {alpha_context} and {beta_context}. Global objective: {agents->orchestrator->goal}. The public action semantics are: {environment->public_information}. The initial facts to include are the union of {agents->agent_alpha->initial_facts} and {agents->agent_beta->initial_facts}. The final goals to include are the union of {agents->agent_alpha->goal_facts} and {agents->agent_beta->goal_facts}. Produce the final PDDL domain and problem for FastDownward, enclosed in the required tags.
